explanation: The code was incorrectly rounding grades down when the remainder was less than 3 by doing ans = n - (n%5). For the typical rounding rule (only round up to the next multiple of 5 when the difference is less than 3), values with remainder 0,1,2 should remain unchanged. I fixed the single incorrect line by keeping ans = n when n%5 < 3 instead of subtracting the remainder.
